article: How to Find Your Dream Career
intro: When you were little, people probably asked, "What do you want to be when you grow up?" Maybe you said a doctor, or an astronaut. Maybe you said an actor, or a lawyer, or a police officer. With starry eyes, you dreamed of the day you would live in a mansion and have all the luxury. A career seemed like something that would never happen, but now that the time has come for you to decide your interests have probably changed. Finding the right career for you can be difficult, but not impossible, so stay positive!
